hibernate-mapping.query: from eu.pms.login.database.SecUser a where a.usrId = ? and a.usrPassword = ? order by a.usrName
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsProjectVw a order by a.proStartDate,proEndDate,proTitle
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsProject a where a.proId = ? order by a.proStartDate,proEndDate,proTitle
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsProjectAlbum a where a.compId.proId = ? order by a.compId.albId
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsProjectAlbum a where a.compId.proId = ? and a.compId.albId = ? order by a.compId.albId
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsProjectDonor a where a.compId.proId = ? order by a.compId.donId
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsProjectsImplementer a where a.compId.proId = ? order by a.compId.impId
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsProjectsLocation a where a.compId.proId = ? order by a.compId.comLatitude
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsProjectsCommunity a where a.compId.proId = ? order by a.compId.comId
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsProjectsBenificiary a where a.compId.proId = ? order by a.compId.btpId
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsProjectsIndicator a where a.compId.proId = ? order by a.compId.indId
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsDonor a order by a.donName
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsImplementer a order by a.impName
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsDevelopmentAgency a order by a.devAbbName
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsProgramm a order by a.prgTitle
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsCommunity a order by a.comName
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsSector a order by a.secType,a.secDesc
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsPermit a order by a.perTitle
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsProjectsBenificiary a order by a.compId.btpId
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsIndicator a order by a.indTitle
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsCommunitiesVw a order by a.comName
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsCommunity a where a.comId = ? order by a.comName
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsIntervention a where a.compId.intId = ? and a.compId.secId = ? order by a.intDesc
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsCommunityTyp a order by a.typDesc
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsMasterPlan a order by a.masMpName
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsSector a order by a.secName
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsIntervention a order by a.intDesc
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsActivity a where a.compId.actId = ? and a.compId.intId = ? and a.compId.secId = ? order by a.actDesc
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsActivity a order by a.actDesc
from eu.pms.lookup.database.PmsBenificiaryTyp a order by a.lookupDesc
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsProjectsBenificiary a order by a.compId.btpId
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsProjectsBenificiary a where a.compId.btpId =? order by a.compId.btpId
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsPermit a order by a.perTitle
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsPermit a where a.perId = ? order by a.perTitle
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsIncident a order by a.incDescription
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsIncident a where a.incId = ? order by a.incDescription
from eu.pms.lookup.database.PmsDatasourc a order by a.lookupDesc
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsStrategicPlanDocument a order by a.strDocId
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsObjectiv a order by a.objDesc
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsObjectiv a where a.objId = ? order by a.objDesc
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsResult a order by a.resDesc
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsResult a where a.compId.resId = ? and a.compId.objId = ? order by a.resDesc
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsObjectiv a order by a.objDesc
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsIndicator a order by a.indTitle
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsIndicator a where a.compId.indId=? and a.compId.resId=? and a.compId.objId=? order by a.indTitle
from eu.pms.lookup.database.PmsGovernate a order by a.lookupDesc
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsProjectAlbum a where a.compId.proId=? order by a.compId.albId desc
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsMasterPlanVw a order by a.masMpName
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsMasterPlan a where a.masId = ? order by a.masMpName
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsMasterPlanDonor a where a.compId.masId = ? order by a.compId.donId
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsMasterPlanCommunity a where a.compId.masId = ? order by a.compId.masId
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsAgricultureSocioVw a order by a.agrArea
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsAgricultureSocio a where a.agrId = ? order by a.agrArea
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsWaterSocioVw a order by a.watUseWatTanker
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsWaterSocio a where a.watId = ? order by a.watUseWatTanker
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsActivity a where a.compId.intId = ? and a.compId.secId = ? order by a.actDesc
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsIndicatorMeasures a where a.compId.indId = ? and a.compId.resId = ? and a.compId.objId = ? order by a.compId.msrDate
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsEconomicSocioVw a order by a.familyAvgSize
from eu.pms.project.database.PmsEconomicSocio a where a.compId.ecoId = ? order by a.familyAvgSize
